description: Attacks on a person or group based on race, religion, ethnicity, nationality, or similar characteristics.
Statements that degrade or demean individuals based on gender or reinforce gender stereotypes.
Offensive language or slurs directed at LGBTQ+ individuals.
Derogatory comments targeting individuals based on their race or ethnicity.
Insulting or mocking religious beliefs, figures, or practices.
Mocking or insulting someone's physical appearance, including weight, height, skin tone, etc.
Derogatory remarks toward people with disabilities or mental health issues.
Offensive or dismissive comments based on someone’s age.
Statements expressing hostility or prejudice against people from other countries or cultures.
Harmful stereotypes or hateful content about men or masculinity.
Repeated or targeted attacks on an individual, often with the intent to intimidate or harm.
Use of explicit language meant to insult or provoke.
Unwanted sexual comments, jokes, or advances.
Statements that suggest or encourage physical harm.
Content that advocates or encourages others to commit harmful acts.
Sharing personal information with malicious intent.
Referring to individuals or groups in ways that strip them of human qualities.
Manipulative language aimed at making someone doubt their reality or worth.
Insulting or mocking cultural practices, attire, or language of a marginalized group.
Intentionally inflammatory or disruptive messages meant to provoke emotional responses.
